title: AI ETFs See Strong Inflows - Which Offers The Best Risk-Reward?
description: Artificial intelligence is driving one of the strongest investment cycles in the market, and AI-focused ETFs are capturing a surge of new inflows as investors look for diversified exposure to the entire ecosystem — from semiconductors and cloud infrastructure to robotics, automation and enterprise AI adoption. With multiple funds outperforming broad-market benchmarks and institutional demand accelerating, understanding which AI ETFs offer the best balance of risk and reward has become essential for investors positioning themselves for the next major technology wave.
content: Artificial intelligence is no longer a speculative technology trend—it's now one of the strongest investment themes in global markets. Institutional capital, retail flows, government funding and corporate spending all continue to accelerate at a pace... [10773 chars]

title: AI won't replace you, but it will redefine what makes you valuable at work
description: Across the world, workers are increasingly anxious that artificial intelligence (AI) will make their jobs obsolete. But the evidence from research and industry tells a very different story. AI is not taking over the workplace. Instead, it's quietly reshaping what human work looks like—and what makes people valuable within it.

title: Chinese use of Claude AI for hacking will drive demand for AI cyber defense, say experts
